price: 85. Ir (atminkite) Ismailį (Izmaelį) ir Idrisą (Enohą) ir Zul-Kiflą (Isają): visi buvo iš As-Sabirun (kantriųjų).
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِدۡرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-is'māʿīla wa-id'rīsa wadhā al-kif'li kullun mina al-ṣābirīna
